div.p: The Renaissance Charter School wants to extend a big THANK YOU to all the first responders, health care workers and essential workers working around the clock supporting all NYC people and our Renaissance community during this time.

As we enter the upcoming crucial weeks of the pandemic please heed the guidance of our public health experts and stay inside and practice 6-feet social distancing if you absolutely have to be in public.

Our building may be closed to help stop the spread of COVID-19, but we are not stopping the learning! We continue to work together to create learning opportunities for your children. Please keep checking your emails and texts for updates.
Announcing The Renaissance Charter School 2! Our replication school will open in September, 2020 in nearby Community School District 24. Email jessicakim@rencharter.org for an application.
